# HeftCoder - AI-Powered Code Generation Platform
# https://app.heftcoder.icu
# Last updated: 2026-01-29

## About HeftCoder
HeftCoder is an AI-powered code generation platform that helps developers build production-ready applications in minutes using autonomous AI agents. Transform your ideas into reality with intelligent code generation.

## Core Features
- AI Code Generation: Describe what you want to build and watch as AI generates production-ready code in real-time
- Intelligent IDE: AI-native development environment with smart code completion and real-time assistance
- CLI Tools: Command-line interface for developers who prefer terminal-based workflows
- Instant Preview: See changes instantly with live preview, no build step required
- Multi-File Support: Work across multiple files seamlessly with full project context
- One-Click Deployment: Deploy to production with a single command

## Pricing Plans
- Basic: $9/month - 10,000 credits, perfect for hobbyists and side projects
- Pro: $25/month - 50,000 credits, for professional developers and startups (Most Popular)
- Studio: $59/month - 150,000 credits, for teams and agencies building at scale
- All plans include a 7-day free trial

## Technology Stack
HeftCoder generates React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS applications. Projects are production-ready and can be deployed anywhere.

## Company
Founded by JP Hartmann. HeftCoder is building the future of AI-assisted software development.
